trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Bullhead City
There were no other sightings in Bullhead City on or around July 4th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the front yard and lokking at the fireworks coming from across the river. I turned to go inside and I just glanced at a light coming from the sky. I was like wow, and turned aroud. There was a ball that looked most like a fireball. It was moving realy fast across the sky from SE to NW. It slowed down so fast it was like an instant stop. But before it stoped it had three lines behind it. they disappeared one by one. After all of them were gone a little little one appeared out of nowhere. A realy bright long gray light hit the tip of the moutains. The little one just stayed there. Lastly the big one shot of so fast i almost didn't see it. Then the little one zig-zag across the sky following the bigger one. And all of it was gone.
